description:
Convert the settings/content page to use a display table.

BUG=74484
TEST=Launch Chrome in German and open the settings/content page. Ensure that there is an adequate margin between the section headings and option values.


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=88868

messages.text:
http://codereview.chromium.org/7003145/diff/1/chrome/browser/resources/options/content_settings.html
File chrome/browser/resources/options/content_settings.html (left):

http://codereview.chromium.org/7003145/diff/1/chrome/browser/resources/options/content_settings.html#oldcode3
chrome/browser/resources/options/content_settings.html:3: <!-- Cookie filter tab contents -->
Wrapping page content in <div class="displaytable">.  The bulk of the edit is an indentation change.

subject: Convert the settings/content page to use a display table.
